bill_title: modify provisions pertaining to the voting rights of members of an Indian tribe.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to modify provisions pertaining to the voting rights of members of an Indian tribe. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. This section modifies provisions pertaining to the voting rights of a member of an Indian tribe.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
